[[Image:The Tolkien Calendar 1994 (Polis: '''The Tolkien Calendar 1994''' is a Polish calendar published by Seckja Tolkienowska, Poland ([[Polish Tolkien Society]]). The calendar features pen and ink illustrations by [[Helena Strokowska]], [[Ryszard Derdzinski]], [[Maciej]], [[Wygnanski]], [[Karolina Stopa]], and [[Ma≈Çgorzata Pudlik]].
